genericRouterVct.cc

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  * =====================================================================================
00003  *
00004  *       Filename:  genericRouterVct.cc
00005  *
00006  *! \brief    Description: Implementing a generic 4 stage physical router model
00007  *    BW->RC->SA->ST->LT
00008  *    Buffer write(BW)
00009  *    Route Computation (RC)
00010  *    Configure Crossbar (CC)
00011  *    Switch Traversal (ST)
00012  *    Link Traversal (LT)
00013  *
00014  *    Model Description in cycles:
00015  *    ---------------------------
00016  *    BW and RC stages happen in the same cycle ( BW pushes the flits into the
00017  *    input buffer and the RC unit. )
00018  *    SA: Pick one output port from n requesting input ports (0<n<p) for the pxp crossbar 
00019  *    ST: Move the flits across the crossbar and push it out on the link
00020  *    LT: This is not modelled within the router and is part of the link component.
00021  *
00022  *        Version:  1.0
00023  *        Created:  03/11/2010 09:20:54 PM
00024  *       Revision:  none
00025  *       Compiler:  gcc
00026  *
00027  *         Author:  Mitchelle Rasquinha (), mitchelle.rasquinha@gatech.edu
00028  *        Company:  Georgia Institute of Technology
00029  *
00030  * =====================================================================================
00031  */
00032 
00033 #ifndef  _genericRouterVct_cc_INC
00034 #define  _genericRouterVct_cc_INC
00035 
00036 #include        "genericRouterVct.h"
00037 using namespace std;
00038 
00039 GenericRouterVct::GenericRouterVct ()
00040 {
00041     name = "Router" ;
00042     ticking = false;
00043 }  /* -----  end of method GenericRouterVct::GenericRouterVct  (constructor)  ----- */
00044 
00045 GenericRouterVct::~GenericRouterVct()
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 void
00050 GenericRouterVct::init (uint p, uint v, uint cr, uint bs)
00051 {
00052     ports =p;
00053     vcs =v;
00054     credits =cr;
00055     buffer_size = bs;
00056 
00057     address = myId();
00058 
00059     /*  set_input_ports(ports); */
00060     in_buffers.resize(ports);
00061     decoders.resize(ports);
00062     input_buffer_state.resize(ports*vcs);
00063     swa.resize(ports);
00064     downstream_credits.resize(ports);
00065 
00066     /*Resize per port stats */
00067     stat_packet_out.resize(ports);
00068     stat_flit_out.resize(ports);
00069 
00070     /* set_output_ports(ports); */
00071     xbar.set_input_ports(ports);
00072     xbar.set_output_ports(ports);
00073     xbar.set_no_virtual_channels(vcs);
00074 
00075     /* All decoders and vc arbiters need to know the node_ip for routing */
00076     for(uint i=0; i<ports; i++)
00077     {
00078         decoders[i].node_ip = node_ip;
00079         decoders[i].address = address;
00080         stat_packet_out[i].resize(ports);
00081         stat_flit_out[i].resize(ports);
00082     }
00083 
00084     /*  set_no_virtual_channels(vcs); */
00085     for(uint i=0; i<ports; i++)
00086     {
00087         downstream_credits[i].resize(vcs);
00088         in_buffers[i].resize( vcs, buffer_size );
00089         decoders[i].resize( vcs );
00090     }
00091 
00092     for(uint i=0; i<ports; i++)
00093         for(uint j=0; j<vcs; j++)
00094             downstream_credits[i][j] = credits;
00095 
00096     /* init the countes */
00097     packets = 0;
00098     flits = 0;
00099     total_packet_latency = 0;
00100 
00101     return ;
00102 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterVct::init  ----- */
00103 
00106 void
00107 GenericRouterVct::set_no_nodes( uint nodes )
00108 {
00109     for ( uint i=0; i<decoders.size(); i++)
00110     {
00111         decoders[i].grid_xloc.resize(nodes);
00112         decoders[i].grid_yloc.resize(nodes);
00113     }
00114 }

00129 
00130 void
00131 GenericRouterVct::process_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00132 {
00133     switch(e->type)
00134     {
00135         case LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT:
00136             handle_link_arrival_event(e);
00137             break;
00138         case TICK_EVENT:
00139             handle_tick_event(e);
00140             break;
00141         default:
00142             _DBG("GenericRouterVct:: Unk event exception %d", e->type);
00143             break;
00144     }
00145     return ;
00146 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterVct::process_event  ----- */

00148 string
00149 GenericRouterVct::print_stats()
00150 {
00151     stringstream str;
00152     str << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] packet latency: " << total_packet_latency
00153         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] flits/packets: " << (flits+0.0)/(packets)
00154         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] average packet latency: " << (total_packet_latency+0.0)/packets
00155         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] last_flit_out_cycle: " << last_flit_out_cycle
00156         << " ";
00157     str << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] packets: " << packets
00158         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] flits: " << flits;
00159     for( uint i=0; i<ports; i++)
00160         for ( uint j=0; j<ports; j++)
00161         {
00162             string in_port = "Inv";
00163             switch( i )
00164             {
00165                 case 0 : 
00166                     in_port = "Inj";
00167                     break;
00168                 case 1:
00169                     in_port = 'E';
00170                     break;
00171                 case 2:
00172                     in_port = 'W';
00173                     break;
00174                 case 3:
00175                     in_port = 'S';
00176                     break;
00177                 case 4:
00178                     in_port = 'N';
00179                     break;
00180                 default:
00181                     in_port = "Invalid";
00182                     break;
00183             }
00184 
00185             string out_port = "Inv";
00186             switch( j )
00187             {
00188                 case 0 : 
00189                     out_port = "Ejection";
00190                     break;
00191                 case 1:
00192                     out_port = 'W';
00193                     break;
00194                 case 2:
00195                     out_port = 'E';
00196                     break;
00197                 case 3:
00198                     out_port = 'N';
00199                     break;
00200                 case 4:
00201                     out_port = 'S';
00202                     break;
00203                 default:
00204                     out_port = "Invalid";
00205                     break;
00206             }
00207             if ( i!=j)
00208             {
00209             str << "\n    router[" << node_ip << "] Packets out " << in_port 
00210                 << " going " << out_port << " : " << stat_packet_out[i][j];
00211             str << "\n    router[" << node_ip << "] Flits out " << in_port 
00212                 << " going " << out_port << " : " << stat_flit_out[i][j];
00213             }
00214 
00215         }
00216 
00217 
00218     return str.str();
00219 }
00220 
00222 void
00223 GenericRouterVct::handle_link_arrival_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00224 {
00225     LinkArrivalData* data = static_cast<LinkArrivalData*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00226     if(data->type == FLIT_ID)
00227     {
00228         /*  Update stats */
00229         flits++;
00230         if( data->ptr->type == TAIL || data->ptr->is_single_flit_pkt )
00231             packets++;
00232 
00233         /*Find the port the flit came in on */
00234         bool found = false;
00235         uint port = -1;
00236         /*  Need to check for null here as there may be null links to corner routers */
00237         for ( uint i=0 ; i< ports ; i++ )
00238             if(static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connections[i])->input_connection) 
00239             if( e->src_id == static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connections[i])->input_connection->address)
00240             {
00241                 found = true;
00242                 port = i;
00243                 break;
00244             }
00245 
00246         /* Throw and exception if it was not found */
00247         if( !found )
00248         {
00249             _DBG(" Input port not found src_addr: %d", e->src_id);
00250         }
00251 
00252         /* Push the flit into the buffer */
00253         in_buffers[port].change_push_channel(data->vc);
00254         in_buffers[port].push(data->ptr);
00255         decoders[port].push(data->ptr,data->vc);
00256         if( data->ptr->type == HEAD )
00257         {
00258             HeadFlit* hf = static_cast<HeadFlit*>(data->ptr);
00259             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].input_port = port;
00260             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].input_channel = data->vc;
00261             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].pipe_stage = FULL;
00262             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_oports.clear(); 
00263             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_ovcs.clear(); 
00264             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_oports.resize(1); 
00265             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_ovcs.resize(1); 
00266             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_oports[0] = decoders[port].get_output_port(data->vc);
00267             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_ovcs[0] = 0;
00268             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].length= hf->length;
00269             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].credits_sent= hf->length;
00270             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].arrival_time= ceil(Simulator::Now());
00271             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].clear_message= false;
00272             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].flits_in_ib = 0;
00273 
00274         }
00275         else
00276         {
00277 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00278             _DBG(" BW inport:%d invc:%d oport:%d ovc:%d ft:%d", port, data->vc,
00279                  input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].output_port, input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].output_channel, data->ptr->type);
00280 #endif
00281 
00282         }
00283         
00284     }
00285     else if ( data->type == CREDIT_ID)
00286     {
00287         /* Find the corresponding output port */
00288         bool found = false;
00289         uint port = -1;
00290         for ( uint i=0 ; ports ; i++ )
00291             if(static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connections[i])->output_connection) /* Some links of corner routers may be null */
00292             if( static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connections[i])->output_connection->address == e->src_id)
00293             {
00294                 port = i;
00295                 found = true;
00296                 break;
00297             }
00298         if(!found)
00299         {
00300             _DBG(" Output port not found src_addr: %d", e->src_id);
00301         }
00302 
00303         downstream_credits[port][data->vc]++;
00304 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00305         _DBG(" Got a credit port:%d vc:%d in_buffers[port][vc]:%d ", port, data->vc, downstream_credits[port][data->vc]);
00306 #endif
00307 
00308     }
00309     else
00310     {
00311         _DBG( "handle_link_arrival_event Unk data type %d ", data->type);
00312     }
00313 
00314         /* Tick since you update a credit or flit */
00315         if(!ticking)
00316         {
00317             ticking = true;
00318             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00319             event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00320             event->vc = e->vc;
00321             Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00322         }
00323 
00324         delete data;
00325         delete e;
00326     return ;
00327 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterVct::handle_link_arrival_event  ----- */
00328 
00329 void
00330 GenericRouterVct::do_switch_traversal()
00331 {
00332     /* Switch traversal */
00333     for( uint i=0; i<ports*vcs; i++)
00334         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST)
00335         {
00336                 uint oport = input_buffer_state[i].output_port;
00337                 uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00338                 if( !xbar.is_empty(oport,0) 
00339                     && input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib > 0
00340                     && downstream_credits[oport][0]>0 )
00341                 {
00342                     in_buffers[iport].change_pull_channel(0);
00343                     Flit* f = in_buffers[iport].pull();
00344                     input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib--;
00345                     
00346                     last_flit_out_cycle = Simulator::Now();
00347 
00348                     LinkArrivalData* data = new LinkArrivalData();
00349                     data->type = FLIT_ID;
00350                     data->vc = 0;
00351                     data->ptr = f;
00352                     
00353                     stat_flit_out[iport][oport]++;
00354 #ifdef _DEEP_DEBUG
00355                     _DBG(" FLIT OUT ftype: %d ", f->type);
00356                     switch( f->type)
00357                     {
00358                         case HEAD:
00359                             cout << static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f)->toString();
00360                             break;
00361                         case BODY:
00362                             cout << static_cast<BodyFlit*>(f)->toString();
00363                             break;
00364                         case TAIL:
00365                             cout << static_cast<TailFlit*>(f)->toString();
00366                             break;
00367                     }
00368 #endif
00369                     IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00370                     event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00371                     event->event_data.push_back(data);
00372                     event->src_id = address;
00373                     event->dst_id = output_connections[oport]->address;
00374                     event->vc = data->vc;
00375                     if(do_two_stage_router)
00376                         Simulator::Schedule( Simulator::Now()+0.75,
00377                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event,
00378                                      static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connections[oport])->output_connection,event);
00379                     else
00380                         Simulator::Schedule( Simulator::Now()+1.75,
00381                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event,
00382                                      static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connections[oport])->output_connection,event);
00383                     static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connections[oport])->flits_passed++;
00384                     downstream_credits[oport][0]--;
00385                     if( f->type == TAIL || f->is_single_flit_pkt )
00386                     {
00387                         /* Update packet stats */
00388                         double lat;
00389                         if(do_two_stage_router)
00390                             lat = Simulator::Now() - input_buffer_state[i].arrival_time;
00391                         else
00392                             lat = (Simulator::Now() - input_buffer_state[i].arrival_time)+1;
00393     
00394                         total_packet_latency+= lat;
00395                         if( f->type == HEAD)
00396                         {
00397                             HeadFlit* hf = static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f);
00398                             hf->avg_network_latency += lat;
00399                             hf->hop_count++;
00400                         }
00401                         else
00402                         {
00403                             TailFlit* tf = static_cast<TailFlit*>(f);
00404                             tf->avg_network_latency += lat;
00405                             tf->hop_count++;
00406                         }
00407                         stat_packet_out[iport][oport]++;
00408 
00409                         input_buffer_state[i].clear_message = true;
00410                         input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = EMPTY;
00411                         swa.clear_winner(input_buffer_state[i].output_port, input_buffer_state[i].input_port);
00412                         xbar.pull(input_buffer_state[i].output_port,input_buffer_state[i].output_channel);
00413 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00414     _DBG(" Tail FO clear pkt for inport %d oport %d ", iport, oport);
00415 #endif
00416                     }
00417                     else
00418                     {
00419 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00420     _DBG(" Flit out for inport %d oport %d fty: %d ", iport, oport, f->type);
00421 #endif
00422                     }
00423 
00424                     /* Safe to send credits here as the flit is sure to empty
00425                      * the buffer. */
00426 //                    if(!send_early_credit)
00427                         send_credit_back(i);
00428 
00429                 }
00430                 else
00431                 {
00432                     if(in_buffers[iport].get_occupancy(0)==0)
00433                     {
00434 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00435                         _DBG(" Waiting for flits on inch %d. Credits are %d",
00436                              iport,downstream_credits[oport][0]);
00437 #endif
00438                     }
00439                     else if (xbar.is_empty(oport,0))
00440                     {
00441                         _DBG_NOARG(" switch was allocated but crossbar is empty ");
00442                     }
00443                     else if (downstream_credits[oport][0] == 0)
00444                     {
00445 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00446                         _DBG(" Waiting for downstream credits on oport %d 0 %d ", oport, 0);
00447 #endif
00448                        ticking = true;
00449                     }
00450                 }
00451 
00452         }
00453 
00454 }
00455 
00456 void
00457 GenericRouterVct::do_switch_allocation()
00458 {
00459     /* Switch Allocation */
00460     for( uint i=0; i<ports*vcs; i++)
00461         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == SWA_REQUESTED)
00462         {
00463             if ( !swa.is_empty())
00464             {
00465                 uint oport = -1;
00466                 SA_unit vca_winner;
00467                 uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00468                 for ( uint j=0; j<input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports.size(); j++)
00469                 {
00470                     oport = input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports[j];
00471                     vca_winner = swa.pick_winner(oport);
00472                 }
00473 
00474                 if( vca_winner.port == iport )
00475                 {
00476                         input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = ST;
00477                         input_buffer_state[i].output_port = oport;
00478                         input_buffer_state[i].output_channel = 0;
00479                         xbar.configure_crossbar(iport,oport,0);
00480                         xbar.push(oport,0); /* The crossbar is generic and needs to know the vc being used as well */
00481 
00482 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00483                 _DBG(" SWA won for inport %d oport %d ", iport, oport);
00484 #endif
00485                     /* After allocating the downstream path for this message
00486                      * send a credit on this inport for the HEAD. 
00487                     if(send_early_credit)
00488                         send_credit_back(i);
00489                      * */
00490                 }
00491                 else
00492                 {
00493 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00494                     _DBG(" Dint win for inport %d SWA winner was inport %d for oport %d "
00495                          ,iport, vca_winner.port, oport);
00496 #endif
00497                         swa.clear_requested(oport, iport);
00498                         input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = FULL;
00499                         input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib--;
00500 
00501                 }
00502                 ticking = true;
00503             }
00504             else
00505             {
00506                 cout << "ERROR SWA was requested but the switch allocator has no requests" << endl;
00507             }
00508         }
00509 
00510 }
00511 
00513 void
00514 GenericRouterVct::handle_tick_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00515 {
00516 
00517 #ifdef _DEEP_DEBUG
00518     _DBG_NOARG("input_buffer_state matrix\n");
00519     for( uint i=0; i<ports*vcs; i++)
00520         cout <<i<<" "<< input_buffer_state[i].toString()<< " buff_occ:" <<in_buffers[input_buffer_state[i].
00521             input_port].get_occupancy(input_buffer_state[i].input_channel) << endl;
00522 #endif
00523 
00524     ticking = false;
00525 
00526     /* We need to estimate the actual time at which the input buffer empties
00527      * and send the credit back. After SA it is known that the buffer for the
00528      * HEAD will empty in the next cycle and hence a credit can be sent to the
00529      * link for the HEAD. Post this a check for if the message is in ST and
00530      * there are flits doing IB. One can send a credit back for BODY and TAIL
00531      * flits such that the credit is at LT when the flit is in ST.
00532     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00533         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST || input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == SW_ALLOCATED)
00534         {
00535             if(in_buffers[input_buffer_state[i].input_port].get_occupancy(input_buffer_state[i].input_channel) >0 
00536                && input_buffer_state[i].credits_sent>0 )
00537                 send_credit_back(i);
00538         }
00539      * */
00540         do_switch_allocation();
00541         do_switch_traversal();
00542 
00543    
00544     /*  Input buffering 
00545      *  Flits are pushed into the input buffer in the link arrival handler
00546      *  itself. To ensure the pipeline stages are executed in reverse pipe
00547      *  order IB is done here and all link_traversals have higher priority and get done before
00548      *  tick. Head/Body and Tail flits go thru the IB stage.*/
00549     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00550         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == FULL )
00551     {
00552 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00553         _DBG(" IB + RC inport:%d oport:%d length:%d arrival_time: %f", input_buffer_state[i].input_port,
00554              input_buffer_state[i].output_port, input_buffer_state[i].length, Simulator::Now());
00555 #endif
00556             input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = IB;
00557             input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib++;
00558             ticking = true;
00559     }
00560 
00565     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00566     {
00567             uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00568             uint oport = input_buffer_state[i].output_port ;
00569 
00570             if ((input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST || input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == IB )
00571 //                      || input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == SWA_REQUESTED 
00572                 && (input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib < in_buffers[iport].get_occupancy(0)))
00573                 { 
00574                     input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib++;
00575                     ticking = true;
00576 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00577                 _DBG(" IB for BODY/TAIL for inport %d oport %d ", iport, oport);
00578 #endif
00579                     /* Sending credits back for body+tail: Condition being
00580                      * HEAD in ST and having downstream credits 
00581                     if(send_early_credit)
00582                         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST && downstream_credits[oport][0] > 0)
00583                             send_credit_back(i);
00584                         */
00585                 }
00586     }
00587 
00588     /* Request Switch Allocation */
00589     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00590     {
00591         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == IB )
00592         {
00593             uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00594             uint oport = input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports[0];
00595             //input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = ROUTED;
00596             if( !swa.is_requested(oport,iport) 
00597                 && downstream_credits[oport][0] == credits)
00598             {
00599                 swa.request(oport, iport);
00600                 input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = SWA_REQUESTED;
00601                 ticking = true;
00602 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00603                 _DBG(" Req SWA for inport %d oport %d  ", iport, oport);
00604 #endif
00605             }
00606 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00607             else
00608             {
00609                 if (swa.is_requested(oport, iport))
00610                 {
00611                     _DBG("Cant req SWA. SWA full inport:%d oport:%d ",iport,oport);
00612                 }
00613                 else if(downstream_credits[input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports[0]][input_buffer_state[i].possible_ovcs[0]] != credits)
00614                 {
00615                     _DBG("Not requesting SWA. No downstream credits for oport:%d ",oport);
00616                 }
00617             }
00618 #endif
00619         }
00620     }
00621     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00622         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST )
00623             ticking = true;
00624 
00625     if(ticking)
00626     {
00627         ticking = true;
00628         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00629         event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00630         event->vc = e->vc;
00631         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00632     }
00633 
00634         delete e;
00635     return;
00636 
00637 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterVct::handle_input_arbitration_event  ----- */
00638 
00639 string
00640 GenericRouterVct::toString() const
00641 {
00642     stringstream str;
00643     str << "GenericRouterVct"
00644         << "\t addr: " << address
00645         << " node_ip: " << node_ip
00646         << "\n Input buffers: " << in_buffers.size() << " ";
00647     if( in_buffers.size() > 0)
00648         str << in_buffers[0].toString();
00649 
00650     str << "\n SWA: " << swa.toString();
00651 
00652     str << "\n decoders: " << decoders.size() << " ";
00653     if( decoders.size() > 0)
00654         str << decoders[0].toString();
00655 
00656     str << "\n Xbar ";
00657     str << xbar.toString();
00658 
00659     return str.str();
00660 }

00662 void

00665 //    if( input_buffer_state[i].credits_sent)
00666 //    {
00667     input_buffer_state[i].credits_sent--;
00668     LinkArrivalData* data = new LinkArrivalData();
00669     uint port = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00670     data->type = CREDIT_ID;
00671     data->vc = input_buffer_state[i].input_channel;
00672     IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00673     event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00674     event->event_data.push_back(data);
00675     event->src_id = address;
00676     event->vc = data->vc; 
00677     if(do_two_stage_router)
00678         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+0.75, &NetworkComponent::process_event,
00679                         static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connections[port])->input_connection, event);
00680     else
00681         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1.75, &NetworkComponent::process_event,
00682                         static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connections[port])->input_connection, event);
00683 
00684 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00685     _DBG(" Credit back for inport %d inch %d ", port, data->vc);
00686 #endif
00687     /* 
00688     }
00689     else
00690     {
00691         _DBG(" Requested to send extra Credit back for inport %d ",
00692              input_buffer_state[i].input_port);
00693     }
00694      * */
00695 }
